app.title: Alysophil Proposal Generator
app.subtitle: AI-Powered Chemistry Solutions
app.tagline: Contract Research Organization specializing in AI-driven molecular design

clientInfo.title: Client Information
clientInfo.description: Enter the client details and proposal references.
clientInfo.validityDateHint: Date until which this proposal remains valid

context.title: Context & Need
context.description: Describe the client's situation, challenges, and the need that this proposal addresses.
context.clientDescriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of the client company, its activities, and its position in the market...
context.clientDescriptionHint: Provide context about the client to personalize the proposal.
context.needPlaceholder: Describe the scientific or technical challenge the client is facing...
context.needHint: What problem does the client need to solve? What are their objectives?
context.proposalActionPlaceholder: e.g. design and optimize a new series of kinase inhibitors
context.proposalActionHint: Summarize in one sentence what Alysophil proposes to do.
context.existingDataPlaceholder: Describe any existing datasets, prior studies, regulatory constraints, or IP considerations...
context.existingDataHint: Any data, compounds, or knowledge the client can provide as a starting point.
context.expectedOutcomePlaceholder: What the client expects to receive at the end of the study...

techSpecs.title: Technical Specifications
techSpecs.description: Define the technical specifications and requirements for the study.
techSpecs.targetPropertiesPlaceholder: e.g. IC50 < 100 nM, LogP between 1 and 3, aqueous solubility > 10 µg/mL
techSpecs.targetPropertiesHint: Physicochemical and biological properties to optimize.
techSpecs.chemicalSpacePlaceholder: e.g. heterocyclic scaffolds, peptide-like structures, natural product derivatives
techSpecs.chemicalSpaceHint: Define the chemical space to explore.
techSpecs.constraintsPlaceholder: e.g. avoid PAINS, no reactive warheads, MW < 500 Da
techSpecs.constraintsHint: Structural alerts, toxicophores, or design rules to respect.
techSpecs.dataFormatPlaceholder: e.g. SDF files, SMILES, activity cliffs analysis, SAR tables
techSpecs.dataFormatHint: Specify expected output formats and data deliverables.

methodology.title: Methodology
methodology.description: Describe the AI-driven methodology that Alysophil will employ.

qspr.title: QSPR Modeling
qspr.description: Quantitative Structure-Property Relationship (QSPR) models correlate molecular structure with physicochemical and biological properties. Alysophil builds predictive models using proprietary AI algorithms trained on curated datasets.
qspr.explanation: QSPR models use machine learning to learn structure-property relationships from existing data, enabling rapid virtual screening and property prediction for new candidate molecules.
qspr.featuresPlaceholder: e.g. Morgan fingerprints, 3D pharmacophore descriptors, quantum-chemical descriptors
qspr.validationPlaceholder: e.g. 5-fold cross-validation, external test set, Y-randomization

prediction.title: Property Prediction
prediction.description: Using trained QSPR models, Alysophil predicts key properties for virtual compound libraries, enabling prioritization of the most promising candidates before synthesis.
prediction.explanation: AI-powered property prediction reduces experimental costs by identifying high-potential candidates in silico, dramatically accelerating the hit-to-lead and lead optimization phases.
prediction.propertiesPlaceholder: e.g. binding affinity, ADMET profile, selectivity index

generation.title: Molecular Generation
generation.description: Alysophil uses generative AI models to design novel molecules with desired property profiles, exploring chemical space beyond traditional medicinal chemistry approaches.
generation.explanation: Generative models propose entirely new molecular structures optimized for multiple objectives simultaneously, opening unexplored regions of chemical space.
generation.approachPlaceholder: e.g. reinforcement learning, variational autoencoders, genetic algorithms
generation.diversityPlaceholder: e.g. Tanimoto distance > 0.3, scaffold diversity, Murcko framework analysis

methodology.additionalMethodsPlaceholder: Describe any complementary computational or experimental methods...
methodology.toolsUsedPlaceholder: e.g. Alysophil proprietary platform, RDKit, Schrödinger, molecular dynamics

studyContent.title: Study Content
studyContent.description: Define the work packages (WPs) that structure the study.
studyContent.wpDescriptionPlaceholder: Detailed description of the activities in this work package...
studyContent.wpObjectivesPlaceholder: List the key objectives for this work package...
studyContent.wpMilestonePlaceholder: Key milestone or decision gate at the end of this WP

wp1.title: Data Collection & Curation
wp1.description: Collect, clean, and curate the chemical and biological data necessary for model training.

wp2.title: QSPR Model Development
wp2.description: Build and validate predictive models for the target properties.

wp3.title: Virtual Screening & Prediction
wp3.description: Apply trained models to screen virtual libraries and predict properties of candidate molecules.

wp4.title: Molecular Generation & Optimization
wp4.description: Generate novel molecular structures optimized for the desired property profile.

wp5.title: Results Analysis & Reporting
wp5.description: Analyze results, prepare final deliverables, and present recommendations to the client.

resources.title: Resources & Team
resources.description: Define the team members and their roles in the project.
resources.name: Name
resources.projectDirectorDescription: Senior oversight, strategic guidance, and client relationship management.
resources.projectLeaderDescription: Day-to-day project management, technical coordination, and quality assurance.
resources.developmentTeamDescription: Computational chemists, data scientists, and AI/ML engineers executing the work.

deliverables.title: Deliverables
deliverables.description: Summary of all project deliverables across work packages.
deliverables.interimDescription: Progress reports, intermediate datasets, and preliminary results delivered during the study.
deliverables.finalDescription: Final report, curated datasets, validated models, and recommended compound lists.
deliverables.formatDescription: Electronic delivery via secure file transfer. Reports in PDF format, data in agreed formats (SDF, CSV, SMILES).

planning.title: Planning
planning.description: Define the project timeline and key milestones.
planning.totalWeeksHint: Automatically calculated from work packages if not overridden.
planning.endDateHint: Calculated based on start date and total duration.
planning.vacationWeeksHint: Number of weeks of planned interruption (holidays, plant closures).
planning.ganttChartDescription: Visual overview of the project timeline.
planning.milestonesDescription: Major checkpoints and decision gates throughout the project.

budget.title: Budget
budget.description: Calculate the project budget based on resource allocation and daily rates.
budget.dailyRateHint: Standard daily rate for the resource category.
budget.fteCountHint: Full-Time Equivalent allocation for this role.
budget.travelExpensesHint: Estimated travel and on-site expenses (if applicable).
budget.consumablesHint: Software licenses, cloud computing, and consumables.

preview.title: Proposal Preview
preview.description: Review the complete proposal before exporting.

ai.title: AI Assistant
ai.description: Use AI to help generate proposal content.

skills.scientificDescription: Generate technically rigorous content about QSPR, molecular modeling, and computational chemistry.
skills.marketingDescription: Create compelling value propositions and persuasive commercial language.
skills.proposalDescription: Structure proposals following best practices for CRO commercial offers.

ai.contextHint: The AI will use the proposal context to generate relevant content.
ai.noApiKey: Please configure your API key in Settings to use the AI assistant.
ai.error: An error occurred while generating content. Please try again.
ai.rateLimited: Rate limit reached. Please wait a moment before trying again.

common.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
common.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone.

slides.confidential: Confidential - Property of Alysophil - Reproduction prohibited
slides.aboutAlysophilContent: Alysophil is a Contract Research Organization (CRO) specializing in AI-powered chemistry. We leverage cutting-edge artificial intelligence and machine learning to accelerate molecular design and optimization.

settings.title: Settings
settings.apiKeyHint: Your API key is stored locally and never sent to our servers.
settings.apiKeyValid: API key is valid and working.
settings.apiKeyInvalid: API key is invalid. Please check and try again.
settings.languageHint: Choose the language for the application interface.
settings.autoSaveHint: Automatically save changes as you type.
settings.companyInfoHint: Alysophil company details used in proposals.
settings.resetSettingsConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to their default values?

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
validation.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number.
validation.proposalIncomplete: Please complete all required fields before exporting.
